mdx.rawBody:
---
status: draft
shortDescription: "An expression must be assigned to have a valid statement"
shortCorrection: "An expression alone, without an assignment, is already a valid statement"
concepts:
  - Assignment
  - Expression
  - Statement
related:
  # - id: LiteralNoExpression
  #   relation: Special case
inOtherPl:
  # - pl: Java
  #   id: NoAtomicExpression
  # - pl: Python
  #   id: NoAtomicExpression
spec:
  - id: ecma11
    sections: ["13.5"]
plVersion:
  # from: ecma6
  # to: ecma11
---

An expression is not a valid statement on its own and must then be assigned to something to reach a valid statement.

frontmatter.shortDescription: An expression must be assigned to have a valid statement
frontmatter.shortCorrection: An expression alone, without an assignment, is already a valid statement
